Gigs.MoreInfo:
Welcome one & all to the final Barefoot in Babylon Fundraiser on Fri 29th April, 8pm til late, The Tavern, Church St, Blackpool. The fabulous line-up includes
ANDY STONES
THE MAGDALENAS
& GAIA for only £5 entry.

If you came to the festival or any of the nights then you’ll know what to expect…high calibre artists in relaxed surroundings, decked out with Persian carpets, cushions & candles plus great tunes between acts to add to the atmosphere.

BandNames.Value: Emily Barker & the Red Clay Halo
